item.title: Projects
item.description: 1. Comparing Rhetorical Agendas of Brazilian Foreign Policymakers The primary objective of this project is to carry out a long-term empirical analysis to discover and to compare the rhetorical agenda of the main actors involved with the Brazilian Foreign Policy. In this regard, my doctoral thesis and my master’s dissertation are both part and parcel of this undertaking. In the latter, I evaluated the historical construction behind the narrative and the use of the concepts of Latin America and South America in Brazilian diplomacy from 1995 to 2014.
